title: Watch: So Your Client Is a Supermodel…
description: Lessons learned from designing for a superstar that can apply to any client
author: AD PRO
excerpt: Lessons learned from designing for a superstar that can apply to any client
text: Everyone dreams of landing their first celebrity client. But what is it actually like working with one?AD has a long history of covering supermodels at home, and famous fashionistas make up some of our most legendary covers over the years. Top model Paloma Elsesser recently joined these ranks with her cool, collected, and super personal Brooklyn home, which graces AD’s February issue.On February 19, in the midst of Fashion Month, AD senior design editor Hannah Martin sat down with Gregory Rockwell and Hester Hodde, the creative team behind the project, to discuss their design process, from working around a client's nonstop travel schedule to custom designing features to fit her very specific needs. In the 45-minute discussion, they delve into the nitty-gritty details of sourcing, workflow, and more. Watch the full video recap below.
html:
Everyone dreams of landing their first celebrity client. But what is it actually like working with one?

AD has a long history of covering supermodels at home, and famous fashionistas make up some of our most legendary covers over the years. Top model Paloma Elsesser recently joined these ranks with her cool, collected, and super personal Brooklyn home, which graces AD’s February issue.

On February 19, in the midst of Fashion Month, AD senior design editor Hannah Martin sat down with Gregory Rockwell and Hester Hodde, the creative team behind the project, to discuss their design process, from working around a client's nonstop travel schedule to custom designing features to fit her very specific needs. In the 45-minute discussion, they delve into the nitty-gritty details of sourcing, workflow, and more. Watch the full video recap below.
